snippet: The Pentagon investigation of a soldier’s bloody rampage in Afghanistan must be swift and thorough so that Afghans can see that America is committed to justice.
abstract: Editorial expresses horror over the massacre of at least 16 Afghan civilians by an American soldier, charging that the Pentagon investigation must be thorough and the punishment swift; notes that incident is yet another dangerous setback for the United States as it tries to draw down its forces in Afghanistan by the end of 2014.
lead_paragraph: The Pentagon investigation of a soldier’s bloody rampage in Afghanistan must be swift and thorough so that Afghans can see that America is committed to justice.
